name: Ms. Take (v. 0.5.1)
description:
Ms. Take wants to talk with you...

Ms. Take is a prototype of an idea that I have some time ago.

 I want to make a game where an AI talks to you and give mini-games where you find some clues about dark events.

Now is just a pong game. Nothing special. But further more I will extend the idea and bring a more ellaborate gameplay, with some others games, better graphics, sounds effects and some surprises.

I hope you like it.

This game was made by me, Thiago L. Watambak, but, integrates the collection of HitKill Studios, a small developer that I make part.
